problem: 如图,将直角三角板45°角的顶点放在圆心O上,斜边和一直角边分别与⊙O相交于A、B两点,C是优弧AB上任意一点(与A、B不重合),则∠ACB的度数是()
comment: 本题考查了圆周角定理的应用,注意:在同圆或等圆中,圆周角等于它所夹弧所对的圆心角的一半．
problem_en: As shown in the figure, place the vertex of the right triangle N_0 angle on the center O, the hypotenuse and the leg intersect ⊙O at two points A and B respectively, and C is any point on the major arc AB (not coincident with A and B) , Then the degree of ∠ACB is ()
